meanings.definition: A person or thing that roasts.
meanings.sent1: The roasters at the barbecue competition were busy grilling delicious meats.
meanings.sent2: My mom is the roaster in our family, always making the best Sunday dinners.
meanings.sent3: The little roaster in the kitchen was determined to cook the perfect Thanksgiving turkey.
meanings.sent4: The roasters in the bakery filled the air with the tempting aroma of freshly baked bread.
meanings.sent5: The skilled roasters at the coffee shop knew exactly how to bring out the best flavors in each bean.

meanings.definition: A container or apparatus for roasting.
meanings.sent1: The chef placed the chicken in the roaster and set the timer.
meanings.sent2: The roaster in the kitchen was used to make the most delicious roasted vegetables.
meanings.sent3: The roaster in the backyard was big enough to cook a whole pig for the luau.
meanings.sent4: The shiny new roaster gleamed under the kitchen lights, ready for Thanksgiving dinner.
meanings.sent5: The electric roaster made cooking a holiday feast much easier and quicker.

meanings.definition: A type of coffee bean that has been roasted.
meanings.sent1: The coffee shop offered a variety of roasters from different regions.
meanings.sent2: I prefer the dark roasters for my morning cup of coffee.
meanings.sent3: The roasters from South America have a rich and bold flavor.
meanings.sent4: The aroma of freshly ground roasters filled the kitchen every morning.
meanings.sent5: The barista recommended trying the light roasters for a more subtle taste profile.
